column6:
"Deadpool",2006,5
How can Spidey take down a man who has kidnapped the X-Men? All we can tell you is-it's not the ending you expect! Plus, major developments in the Peter/Kitty relationship-is it all just fun and games between the two...or is there something more going on? Don't miss it! Part 4 (of 4)
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:John Dell | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
